title: Discovery QRD-048: dimensional_fusion
hypothesis: Hypothesis: Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(DeterministicASI) exhibits novel properties under dimensional_fusion transformation
core_mechanism: Core mechanism: An innovative deterministic modular system fusing dimensions in Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(DeterministicASI) creating emergent unique properties with distributed network effect capabilities through 2 interaction patterns

formulation.pseudocode:
function apply_dimensional_fusion(system):
  return transform(system, Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(DeterministicASI))
formulation.formal_spec: Formal: Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(DeterministicASI) → An innovative deterministic modular system fusing dimensions in Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(DeterministicASI) creating emergent unique properties with distributed network effect capabilities via dimensional_fusion

industrial_impact.application: Application of dimensional_fusion in production systems
industrial_impact.market_sector: Quantum Computing, AI Systems, Advanced Materials

failure_modes: dimensional_fusion may not scale beyond simulation
